background.title: Reservation System Background

problems.title: Problems
problems.manual: Previously, we had to manually write meeting room names and times in Slack messages to make reservations.
problems.availability: We had to open doors to check if meeting rooms were currently in use or empty. 'Oh, you're in a meeting right now. I'm sorry.'
problems.overlap: It was difficult to check if times overlapped, so it was easy to make duplicate reservations.

background.solution:
To solve this, this system was created.
Try making a reservation with just a few clicks and it will automatically send a Slack message.
You can easily check the status of the meeting room.
